entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Saint-Quentin
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
